title: leavebuster rests randomly to 20 mins
body:
Hello,
not gonna argue the leavebuster cause i kind of love the 20 min breaks.
but it is randomly resting back to 20 min. i waiting for 2.5 cycles 50 min keeps resting.

HELPPP please.{{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

replies.body: Been seeing a few reports about this!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'd like to assist individually and  look at these cases to investigate the issue.
Same here. This is annoying as fuck!
Same. The fuck is this. Rito help..
